title: smoothie
author: smoothie
created_time: October 09, 2022, 09:14:38 PMLast edit: February 21, 2023, 02:14:30 AM by smoothie
content: THE WORLD’S SMALLEST LOADABLE PHYSICAL BITCOIN …COIN…lol LEALANA 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER BITCOIN CENTS (0.01 BTC) w/ "RAINBOWS AND UNICORNS"Note - I may be wrong, this may not be the smallest. It is the smallest I’m aware of.======================================================================ONE ROLL OF TEN x 0.01 BTC  1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENTS  (NON-RAINBOW)  ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————DIAMETER = 19.8mmONE Roll of 10 x 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENTS (regular silver non-rainbow)======================================================================SIX-COIN SET (Limited to 70 sets)         SOLD OUT   —————————————————————————————————————————————————————————CONTENTS:Regular Silver Finish CoinsONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT       ONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT  Fully Gold PlatedONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT  Gold-Select PlatedRainbow Silver coinsONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLOREDONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLORED Fully Gold PlatedONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLORED Gold-Select Plated** All 6 coins will have the same serial #, come in clear airtight capsules, and their own unique certificate of authenticity (COA).======================================================================INDIVIDUAL COIN PRICING (Limited to 70 of each type sold as SINGLES)—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————REGULAR SILVER 1/10th OZ = (Not sold as singles)ONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT  Fully Gold Plated SOLD OUT ONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT  Gold-Select Plated =SOLD OUT Rainbow coinsONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLORED = SOLD OUTONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLORED Fully Gold Plated = SOLD OUT ONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLORED Gold-Select Plated = SOLD OUT======================================================================SERIAL NUMBERS——————————————————Six-coin matching numbered sets are randomly selected from #1 thru #139Regular silver coins bought as rolls will have numbers #140 and above by default.GOLD-SELECT PLATING LAYOUT——————————————————MAX MINTAGES—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————ONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT………………………………………..…………..………………………………..1,000 ONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT  Fully Gold Plated……………………………………..…………………140 (70 six-coin sets, 70 singles)ONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT  Gold-Select Plated………………………………………………………140 (70 six-coin sets, 70 singles)Rainbow coinsONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLORED……………………………..…………………………140 (70 six-coin sets, 70 singles)ONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLORED Fully Gold Plated……………………………140 (70 six-coin sets, 70 singles)ONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLORED Gold-Select Plated…………………………140 (70  six-coin sets, 70 singles)IMPORTANT =====> TIME FRAMES:—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————Approximately I should have the following versions in-hand (in my possession) in terms of time as follows:- regular silver fully gold plated  =  5-6 weeks - regular silver gold select plated version = 6-7 weeks- regular silver RAINBOW versions =  7-8 weeks- silver Rainbow gold plated and gold select versions = 8-10 weeksPlease make the proper considerations for yourself when making a purchase for specific coin types listed above. Some types may end up coming in sooner than the estimated time frames above.CERTIFICATE OF AUTHENTICITY============================================Each coin will come with a certificate of authenticity along with a clear airtight capsule.If you are curious what the COAs will look like. They will look very similar in style to the 2013 COAs, just much smaller (approximately 50% smaller in size).BITCOIN ADDRESS, SERIAL #, AND KEY  =========================================Each individual coin is sold with two copies of the private key. One is printed on paper and the other is put on to the coin itself under the hologram. Both copies of the key are under the respective coin's hologram.Bitcoin addresses and associated serial #’s are also visible on the back of each coin. SEE EXAMPLE BELOW:HOW TO ORDER:Send me a private message on Bitcointalk.org or send an email to Smoothie@lealana.com with the following order format (see below).Code:Example order #1:ONE SIX-COIN SILVER SET TWO ROLLS OF TEN x 0.01 BTC  1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENTSONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT  Fully Gold Plated THREE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT  Gold-Select Plated FOUR 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLORED FIVE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLORED Fully Gold PlatedSIX 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLORED Gold-Select Plated Example order #2:TWO SIX-COIN SILVER SETSONE ROLLS OF TEN x 0.01 BTC  1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENTSONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT  Fully Gold Plated ONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT  Gold-Select Plated TWO 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLORED FOUR 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLORED Fully Gold PlatedONE 0.01 BTC 1/10th oz 999 FINE SILVER CENT   RAINBOW COLORED Gold-Select Plated PLEASE BE SAFE AND WATCH OUT FOR SCAMMERS ASKING FOR PAYMENT WITH SIMILAR USERNAMES.ALL PAYMENT MESSAGES WILL BE PGP SIGNED WITH MY PUBLIC KEY ON MY SIGNATURE. LINK - https://bitcoin-otc.com/viewgpg.php?nick=SmoothieSHIPPINGUS Domestic Shipping = $40International Shipping = $60PGP SIGNED ADDRESS LISTS=====================================SINGLE ROLLS - PGP-signed lists will be provided for each roll. Entire roll of ten Bitcoin addresses will be signed in a single PGP-signed message.SETS and SINGLES - PGP-signed lists will also be provided.TERMS AND CONDITIONS: www.lealana.com/tac.phpTURNAROUND TIMECOINS WILL BE SHIPPED 2 to 4 WEEKS AFTER THE TIMEFRAMES LISTED ABOVE ^, AFTER PAYMENT HAS BEEN MADE, AND ASSUMING FUNDING OF THE COIN ADDRESSES ARE DONE IN A TIMELY MANNER. IN SOME CASES IT MAY SHIP SOONER. ALL COINS ARE REQUIRED TO BE FUNDED BY THE CUSTOMER BEFORE SHIPMENT. All Shipments are shipped via USPS Registered Mail with restricted delivery (meaning you have to show your ID and sign for the package).If you wish to purchase Lealana BTC 1/10th oz silver coins and do not wish to fund the coins, you may do so but each coin’s hologram will be marked as “BUYER FUNDED” denoting this coin was never funded before it shipped.FUNDING YOUR COIN(S) <—— Important1. All coins intended on being funded are required to be funded BEFORE they are shipped out. Any digital value that is stored on the coins while in transit are at your sole risk and responsibility. Lealana is not responsible for any digital cryptocurrency value while in transit by mail courier.2. Your coin address list will be PGP signed and sent to you for you to fund with the EXACT face value of (0.01 BTC).3. Should you miss this deadline your coin shipment will be delayed. DISCLOSURE OF RAINBOW COLOR VARIATION==========================================There is a possibility that the rainbow color may vary with these coins given the production process being used is different than the brass/nickel coin process.This is to notify you that this possibility may exist and that Lealana will not be held liable for any such color differences/variations from the pictures presented above. Before purchasing, please consider this and make your own decision whether to buy or not.

comments.body: There has been an overwhelming amount of interest in these coins.I see all of your PMs and emails, I will reply to each of them shortly.Mahalo for your patience,Smoothie

comments.author: smoothie
comments.body: Update: I've gotten through all the pending messages (PMs and emails for the moment). Wow.Here is the remaining count of SIX-COIN sets available for purchase out of 70 TOTAL SETS: 19 SETS LEFTIf you have not paid yet please try to pay soon as you can.  I would not want to have to remove your 6-coin set order from the list due to too much demand and other buyers paying before you due to a delay in payment.
